ActRoyal Canadian Mounted Police Pension Continuation Act
SubjectRoyal Canadian Mounted Police (Dependants) Pension Fund Increase in Benefits Order
PrecisROYAL CANADIAN MOUNTED POLICE (DEPENDANTS) PENSION FUND INCREASE IN BENEFITS ORDER in order to make benefit increases of 1.9% be applied effective April 1, 2017, April 1, 2018 and April 1, 2019.
